Generation VIII.Sword: They came over from another region long ago and worked together with humans. Their green skin is resistant to water.
Generation VIII.Shield: These Pokémon live in herds. Their trunks have incredible grip strength, strong enough to crush giant rocks into powder.

Generation IX.Scarlet: This Pokémon was brought to Paldea long ago by people from a faraway land. It’s so strong that it can easily pull an airplane.
Generation IX.Violet: Copperajah are prideful, cantankerous Pokémon. Specimens with vibrant green skin command the respect of others of their kind.
